The Menu of the day is ordered until 15:00 pm

28 lei without dessert / 41 lei with dessert

Friday 

Cream Broccoli Soup  – vegan /gluten free / paper bio container / 330 ml (broccoli, zucchini, potato, celery, white onion, olive oil, natural condiments, himalayan salt)

Chickpea  with Coconut Milk – vegan / gluten free / paper bio container / 300 g (chickpea, coconut milk, red bell pepper, carrot, red onion, natural condiments, himalayan salt)

Whole Wheat Bread – vegan / with gluten / 70 g (whole wheat, yeast, olive oil, himalayan salt)

or gluten free option

Corn & Red Bell Pepper Crackers Bread- raw / gluten free / 40 g (corn, red bell pepper, flaxseed, natural condiments, himalayan salt)

Cocoa and Mint Cake – raw / gluten free / 110 g (cashew, almonds, dates, cocoa butter, coconut, fresh mint, fresh cocoa powder, unfiltered honey)
